projects.title: Learning Management System
projects.description: Led a team of 6 to deliver an LMS platform with backend architecture and RESTful API services. Designed user-friendly, mobile-responsive UI/UX with micro-interactions and animations.

projects.title: Solar Construction Management Website
projects.description: Designed and implemented client-side and server-side architecture and led team of 5. Developed relational database concepts for seamless connection between teams.

projects.title: Church Management Website
projects.description: Developed a single-page application website with admin dashboard. Integrated third-party APIs, such as the Bible API, to fetch data into the website. Managed technical documentation for feature implementation.

projects.title: University Android App
projects.description: Led development of university app with UI design and integrated functionalities. Developed features like a resume builder, GPA calculator, and storage provider for documents. Improved user performance by 50% and achieved 10,000+ user downloads.
